meta.siteDescription: An educational platform for psychological awareness and self-development - Trusted, meaningful content for a better life

hero.title: Your Journey to Deeper Awareness Starts Here
hero.subtitle: Trusted educational content to help you understand yourself better and develop your life in a balanced and healthy way

awareness.title: Psychological Awareness
awareness.description: Articles to help you understand your emotions and thoughts, and handle them wisely

selfDevelopment.title: Self Development
selfDevelopment.description: Practical tools and tips to improve your personal and professional life

footer.aboutText: SelfActual is an educational platform dedicated to spreading psychological awareness and supporting your self-development journey. We do not provide therapy or medical diagnosis.
footer.madeWith: Made with ❤️ for awareness and growth

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: We believe psychological awareness is a right for everyone. Our goal is to provide trusted, accessible content that helps you understand yourself and others better, leading to a more balanced and fulfilling life.
mission.disclaimer: Important Note: The content provided here is educational only and is not a substitute for professional consultation.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear your thoughts and suggestions
